text: Adina Paytan is a research professor at the Institute of Marine Sciences at the University of California, Santa Cruz. This includes studies of groundwater discharge into coastal systems, nutrient cycling, ocean acidification, and paleoceanography. She has over 160 scientific publications in prestigious journals such as Science, Nature, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, and Geophysical Research Letters. ==References== Category:Women oceanographers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:University of California, Santa Cruz faculty
title: Adina Paytan
